steps.name: When Click on the settings option
Then Verify user is fully logged in
When Click on Add a project
Then Verify the right page opens
When Add some test information to the input fields
Then Verify the correct information is present in the input fields
And Verify the “Send an application” button is available and clickable

fullName: Testing the Add a project section under the settings menu: User can add a project through the settings

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Testing the Add a project section under the settings menu
